verses.verse: Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu, <S%H30><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> each <S%H376><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> his censer, <S%H4289><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in it, <S%H2004><s%> and laid <S%H5414><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> on it, <S%H7126><s%> and offered strange <S%H2114><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> which he had not commanded them. <S%H6680><s%>
And fire <S%H784><s%> came forth <S%H3318><s%> from before Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and devoured <S%H398><s%> them, <S%H4191><s%> and they died before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> "This is what Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> of, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H6942><s%> 'I will show myself holy to those who come near <S%H7138><s%> me, <S%H6440><s%> and before all the people <S%H5971><s%> I will be glorified. <S%H3513><s%>'" Aaron <S%H175><s%> held his peace. <S%H1826><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Mishael <S%H4332><s%> and Elzaphan, <S%H469><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziel <S%H5816><s%> the uncle <S%H1730><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H7126><s%> "Draw near, carry <S%H5375><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> out <S%H2351><s%> of the camp. <S%H4264><s%>"
So they drew near, <S%H7126><s%> and carried <S%H5375><s%> them in their coats <S%H3801><s%> out <S%H2351><s%> of the camp, <S%H4264><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> had said. <S%H1696><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and to Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and to Ithamar, <S%H385><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> "Don't <S%H7218><s%> let the hair of your heads go loose, <S%H6544><s%> neither tear <S%H6533><s%> your clothes; <S%H899><s%> that you don't <S%H4191><s%> die, and that he not be angry <S%H7107><s%> with all the congregation: <S%H5712><s%> but let your brothers, <S%H251><s%> the whole house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> bewail <S%H1058><s%> the burning <S%H8316><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has kindled. <S%H8313><s%>

You shall not go out <S%H3318><s%> from the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> lest you die; <S%H4191><s%> for the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is on you. <S%H6213><s%>" They did according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Drink <S%H8354><s%> no wine <S%H3196><s%> nor strong drink, <S%H8354><s%> you, <S%H1121><s%> nor your sons with you, <S%H935><s%> when you go into the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> that you don't <S%H4191><s%> die: it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations: <S%H1755><s%>
and that you are to make a distinction <S%H914><s%> between the holy <S%H6944><s%> and the common, <S%H2455><s%> and between the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean; <S%H2889><s%>

and that you are to teach <S%H3384><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> all the statutes <S%H2706><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> to them by <S%H3027><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and to Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and to Ithamar, <S%H385><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> who were left, <S%H3498><s%> "Take <S%H3947><s%> the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> that remains <S%H3498><s%> of the offerings <S%H4503><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> made by fire, <S%H801><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> it without yeast <S%H4682><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the altar; <S%H4196><s%> for it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy; <S%H6944><s%>

and you shall eat <S%H398><s%> it in a holy <S%H6918><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> because it is your portion, <S%H2706><s%> and your sons <S%H1121><s%>' portion, <S%H2706><s%> of the offerings <S%H801><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> made by fire: <S%H801><s%> for so I am commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

The waved <S%H8573><s%> breast <S%H2373><s%> and the heaved <S%H8641><s%> thigh <S%H7785><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> in a clean <S%H2889><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> you, <S%H1121><s%> and your sons, and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> with you: <S%H2706><s%> for they are given as your portion, and your sons <S%H1121><s%>' portion, <S%H2706><s%> out <S%H5414><s%> of the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of the peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

The heaved <S%H8641><s%> thigh <S%H7785><s%> and the waved <S%H8573><s%> breast <S%H2373><s%> they shall bring <S%H935><s%> with the offerings made by fire <S%H801><s%> of the fat, <S%H2459><s%> to wave <S%H5130><s%> it for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> and it shall be yours, <S%H1121><s%> and your sons' with you, <S%H2706><s%> as a portion forever; <S%H5769><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has commanded. <S%H6680><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> diligently <S%H1875><s%> inquired <S%H1875><s%> about the goat <S%H8163><s%> of the sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and, <S%H8313><s%> behold, it was burned: and he was angry <S%H7107><s%> with Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and with Ithamar, <S%H385><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> who were left, <S%H3498><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Why haven't <S%H398><s%> you eaten the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> since it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy, <S%H6944><s%> and he has given <S%H5414><s%> it you to bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> to make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for them before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh? <S%H3068><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> its blood <S%H1818><s%> was not brought <S%H935><s%> into the inner <S%H6441><s%> part of the sanctuary: <S%H6944><s%> you certainly <S%H398><s%> should have eaten <S%H398><s%> it in the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> as I commanded. <S%H6680><s%>"

Aaron <S%H175><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Behold, <S%H3117><s%> this day they have offered <S%H7126><s%> their sin offering <S%H2403><s%> and their burnt offering <S%H2403><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and such things as these have happened <S%H7122><s%> to me: <S%H398><s%> and if I had eaten the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> today, <S%H3117><s%> would it have been pleasing <S%H3190><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Yahweh? <S%H3068><s%>"
When Moses <S%H4872><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that, <S%H3190><s%> it was pleasing in his sight.
